setup.name: Setup & Foundation
setup.description: Initial project setup, dependencies, and configuration

testing.name: Testing & Validation
testing.description: Comprehensive testing, validation, and quality assurance

polish.name: Polish & Refinement
polish.description: UX improvements, optimization, and release preparation

maintenance.name: Maintenance
maintenance.description: Bug fixes, updates, and ongoing support

tasks.title: CAAMP v0.1.0 - Initial Release
tasks.description: Initial release of CAAMP as @cleocode/caamp on npm. Includes unified provider registry (28 providers), MCP server management, skills management, instructions injection, and library API for programmatic usage.
notes: [COMPLETED 2026-02-11T22:13:42Z] All 19 child tasks complete. CAAMP v0.1.0 published to npm as @cleocode/caamp. GitHub repo at https://github.com/kryptobaseddev/caamp. 28 providers, 74 tests, 57 library exports.

tasks.title: Implement unified provider registry with 28 AI coding agent definitions
tasks.description: Created src/core/registry/providers.ts with getAllProviders, getProvider, resolveAlias, getProvidersByPriority, and providers/ directory with 28 YAML provider definitions.
notes: [COMPLETED 2026-02-11T22:10:26Z] 28 providers in registry. Tests in tests/unit/registry.test.ts (14 tests).

tasks.title: Implement provider auto-detection engine
tasks.description: Created src/core/registry/detection.ts with detectProvider, detectAllProviders, getInstalledProviders, detectProjectProviders. Supports binary, directory, appBundle, and flatpak detection methods.
notes: [COMPLETED 2026-02-11T22:10:34Z] Detection works for all 28 providers via multiple methods.

tasks.title: Implement config format handlers (JSON/JSONC, YAML, TOML)
tasks.description: Created src/core/formats/ with json.ts, yaml.ts, toml.ts, utils.ts, and index.ts router. JSONC preserves comments via jsonc-parser. Includes readConfig, writeConfig, deepMerge, setNestedValue, getNestedValue, ensureDir.
notes: [COMPLETED 2026-02-11T22:10:42Z] 18 tests in tests/unit/formats.test.ts covering all formats.

tasks.title: Implement MCP server config installer with format transforms
tasks.description: Created src/core/mcp/installer.ts with installMcpServer, installMcpServerToAll, buildServerConfig. Created src/core/mcp/transforms.ts for provider-specific config transformations (Goose YAML, Zed JSON, etc).
notes: [COMPLETED 2026-02-11T22:10:50Z] 8 tests in tests/unit/installer.test.ts.

tasks.title: Implement lock file management for MCP servers and skills
tasks.description: Created src/core/mcp/lock.ts and src/core/skills/lock.ts sharing ~/.agents/.caamp-lock.json. Tracks installations, versions, selected agents.
notes: [COMPLETED 2026-02-11T22:10:59Z] 3 tests in tests/unit/lock.test.ts.

tasks.title: Implement skills installer, discovery, validator, and audit scanner
tasks.description: Created src/core/skills/ with installer.ts (canonical + symlink model), discovery.ts (parseSkillFile, discoverSkills), validator.ts (Agent Skills standard validation), and audit/scanner.ts (security scanning with SARIF output).
notes: [COMPLETED 2026-02-11T22:11:08Z] Skills install, remove, discover, validate, scan, and toSarif all working.

tasks.title: Implement source parser for GitHub/npm/URL/local/command sources
tasks.description: Created src/core/sources/parser.ts with parseSource and isMarketplaceScoped. Classifies inputs as remote, package, command, github, gitlab, or local.
notes: [COMPLETED 2026-02-11T22:11:17Z] 13 tests in tests/unit/source-parser.test.ts.

tasks.title: Implement instructions injection system for agent config files
tasks.description: Created src/core/instructions/injector.ts and templates.ts. Supports inject, checkInjection, removeInjection, checkAllInjections, injectAll with CLEO-style marker blocks.
notes: [COMPLETED 2026-02-11T22:11:28Z] Injection system handles CLAUDE.md, AGENTS.md, GEMINI.md and all provider instruction files.

tasks.title: Implement marketplace client for skill discovery
tasks.description: Created src/core/marketplace/client.ts with MarketplaceClient class for searching and fetching skills from the marketplace API.
notes: [COMPLETED 2026-02-11T22:11:36Z] Client supports search, list, and fetch operations.

tasks.title: Implement CLI with commander.js command structure
tasks.description: Created src/cli.ts and src/commands/ with providers (list, search), mcp (install, list, remove, detect), skills (install, remove, list, validate, audit), instructions (inject, check, remove), and marketplace commands.
notes: [COMPLETED 2026-02-11T22:11:45Z] Full CLI with interactive prompts via @clack/prompts.

tasks.title: Create src/core/mcp/reader.ts with library API for MCP read/list/remove
tasks.description: NEW file: src/core/mcp/reader.ts with resolveConfigPath, listMcpServers, listAllMcpServers, removeMcpServer. Extracted from CLI commands into reusable core functions.
notes: [COMPLETED 2026-02-11T22:11:56Z] 18 tests in tests/unit/mcp-reader.test.ts. All functions tested with temp dirs and mock configs.

tasks.title: Add removeConfig format router to src/core/formats/index.ts
tasks.description: Added removeConfig() that routes to removeJsonConfig, removeYamlConfig, or removeTomlConfig. Re-exported getNestedValue and ensureDir from utils.
notes: [COMPLETED 2026-02-11T22:12:05Z] Parallels existing readConfig/writeConfig pattern.

tasks.title: Add McpServerEntry type to src/types.ts
tasks.description: Added McpServerEntry interface with name, providerId, providerName, scope, configPath, and config fields for typed MCP list results.
notes: [COMPLETED 2026-02-11T22:12:15Z] Used by listMcpServers and listAllMcpServers return values.

tasks.title: Refactor mcp list/remove/detect commands to delegate to core reader
tasks.description: Updated src/commands/mcp/list.ts, remove.ts, and detect.ts to use listMcpServers, removeMcpServer, and resolveConfigPath from src/core/mcp/reader.ts instead of inline config reading.
notes: [COMPLETED 2026-02-11T22:12:24Z] Removed ~30 lines of duplicated config reading logic from CLI commands.

tasks.title: Export ~25 new symbols from src/index.ts for library API
tasks.description: Added exports for: MCP reader (4), MCP lock (6), skills lock (4), format utils (removeConfig, getNestedValue, deepMerge, ensureDir), result types (DetectionResult, InstallResult, SkillInstallResult, ValidationResult, ValidationIssue), and McpServerEntry type.
notes: [COMPLETED 2026-02-11T22:12:35Z] 57 total exports from library entry point. All planned imports from the CLEO integration surface are now available.

tasks.title: Move resolveConfigPath from installer to reader
tasks.description: Removed private resolveConfigPath from src/core/mcp/installer.ts. Installer now imports it from src/core/mcp/reader.ts. Single source of truth for config path resolution.
notes: [COMPLETED 2026-02-11T22:12:44Z] No behavior change, just module organization.

tasks.title: Update package.json name to @cleocode/caamp with publishConfig
tasks.description: Changed package name from caamp to @cleocode/caamp. Added publishConfig.access: public for npm scoped package publishing.
notes: [COMPLETED 2026-02-11T22:12:54Z] Package name updated and publishConfig added.

tasks.title: Create GitHub repo kryptobaseddev/caamp and push code
tasks.description: Created public repo at https://github.com/kryptobaseddev/caamp. Pushed all code to main branch.
notes: [COMPLETED 2026-02-11T22:13:03Z] Repo live at https://github.com/kryptobaseddev/caamp

tasks.title: Publish @cleocode/caamp@0.1.0 to npm registry
tasks.description: Published @cleocode/caamp@0.1.0 to the public npm registry under the cleocode organization. 72.9 kB package, 11 files.
notes: [COMPLETED 2026-02-11T22:13:13Z] Live at https://www.npmjs.com/package/@cleocode/caamp shasum: 51c111228ba5f62ff68962b8aff0bc6b902c19b0

tasks.title: CAAMP v0.2.0 - Documentation, Modernization & Fixes
notes: [COMPLETED 2026-02-11T23:23:36Z] All 7 child tasks complete. README rewritten with banner, deps modernized, skills update/check fixed, 46 new tests (120 total), registry expanded to 41 providers.

tasks.title: Rewrite README.md with banner, install fixes, architecture, and doc links
notes: [COMPLETED 2026-02-11T23:18:01Z] README rewritten: banner, badges, proper install, library usage, architecture, doc links, contributing. 85â†’204 lines.

tasks.title: Modernize package.json deps and bump Node engine to >=20
notes: [COMPLETED 2026-02-11T23:18:02Z] commander ^14, @clack/prompts ^1.0, Node >=20, tsup target node20. 74/74 tests pass.

tasks.title: Fix npx install - scoped package needs npx @cleocode/caamp
notes: [COMPLETED 2026-02-11T23:18:03Z] Fixed npx caamp to npx @cleocode/caamp in README and PRD.

tasks.title: Fix skills update stub command - implement network version checking
notes: [COMPLETED 2026-02-11T23:23:25Z] Implemented network-based version checking in checkSkillUpdate using simple-git ls-remote. skills update now actually compares SHAs and reinstalls outdated skills.

tasks.title: Fix skills check - add network-based version comparison
notes: [COMPLETED 2026-02-11T23:23:27Z] skills check now uses network-based checkSkillUpdate to compare remote vs local versions.

tasks.title: Add test coverage for marketplace/ and instructions/ modules
notes: [COMPLETED 2026-02-11T23:23:28Z] Added 46 new tests: 25 for instructions (injector + templates) and 21 for marketplace (client + adapters). Total: 120 tests.

tasks.title: Expand provider registry from 28 to 40+ providers
notes: [COMPLETED 2026-02-11T23:23:29Z] Expanded from 28 to 41 providers. Added: aider, amazon-q, supermaven, tabnine, codeium, augment, blackbox-ai, devin, replit-agent, mentat, sourcery, double, codegen.

tasks.title: CAAMP v0.3.0 - API Documentation, Quality & Outstanding Gaps
notes: 2026-02-11 23:42:51 UTC: Epic covering: (1) API-REFERENCE.md accuracy audit, (2) TSDoc annotations for auto-generated API docs, (3) v0.3.0 deferred items from GAP-ANALYSIS.md, (4) Gap Analysis document update
[COMPLETED 2026-02-12T00:02:05Z] v0.3.0 epic complete: 8 tasks done - API audit, bug fixes, doctor command, verbose/quiet flags, API docs fixes, TSDoc annotations, TypeDoc setup, gap analysis update

tasks.title: Audit API-REFERENCE.md against actual src/index.ts exports
notes: 2026-02-11 23:42:59 UTC: Compare every function/type/class documented in docs/API-REFERENCE.md against actual source code. Check: (1) All 82 exports are present and signatures match, (2) Parameter types/defaults are accurate, (3) Return types match implementation, (4) Examples are runnable, (5) Missing exports not documented, (6) Report discrepancies as findings

[COMPLETED 2026-02-11T23:47:57Z] API audit complete - 12 discrepancies found across 82 exports. 2 critical (checkSkillUpdate return type + outdated description), 1 high (MarketplaceClient return type mismatch). All 25 types verified exact match. Full report at claudedocs/agent-outputs/T030-api-audit.md

tasks.title: Add TSDoc annotations to all public API exports
notes: 2026-02-11 23:43:07 UTC: Add JSDoc/TSDoc comments to all 82 exported symbols in src/. Must include: @param, @returns, @example for every public function. This enables automated API doc generation via TypeDoc or similar tooling. Covers: src/core/registry/providers.ts, src/core/registry/detection.ts, src/core/mcp/installer.ts, src/core/mcp/reader.ts, src/core/mcp/transforms.ts, src/core/mcp/lock.ts, src/core/skills/installer.ts, src/core/skills/discovery.ts, src/core/skills/validator.ts, src/core/skills/audit/scanner.ts, src/core/skills/lock.ts, src/core/marketplace/client.ts, src/core/instructions/injector.ts, src/core/instructions/templates.ts, src/core/formats/index.ts, src/core/formats/utils.ts, src/core/sources/parser.ts, src/types.ts
[COMPLETED 2026-02-12T00:01:56Z] TSDoc annotations added to all 19 public API source files. Build, typecheck, 120 tests pass.

tasks.title: Set up automated API doc generation with TypeDoc
notes: 2026-02-11 23:43:14 UTC: Install and configure TypeDoc for automated API reference generation from TSDoc comments. Create: (1) typedoc.json config, (2) npm run docs:api script, (3) Generate initial API docs to docs/api/ directory, (4) Add to CI workflow for validation (typedoc --validation), (5) Update README.md to link generated docs, (6) Ensure output matches or supersedes manual API-REFERENCE.md
[COMPLETED 2026-02-12T00:01:13Z] TypeDoc configured, docs:api and docs:api:check scripts added, CI validation step added, docs/api/ in .gitignore, README updated

tasks.title: Fix v0.3.0 deferred bugs: Windows detect, sourceType hardcode, lock file dedup
notes: 2026-02-11 23:43:25 UTC: Three deferred v0.2.0 bugs from GAP-ANALYSIS.md Section 5.2: (1) providers detect uses Unix-only 'which' - needs 'where' fallback on win32 in src/core/registry/detection.ts, (2) skills install sourceType hardcoded to 'github' in src/commands/skills/install.ts:56 - should use parsed.type, (3) Deduplicate writeLockFile functions - duplicated in src/core/mcp/lock.ts and src/core/skills/lock.ts with no coordination

[COMPLETED 2026-02-11T23:47:48Z] Fixed all 3 deferred v0.3.0 bugs: (1) Windows detection uses where instead of which on win32, (2) sourceType uses parsed.type instead of hardcoded github, (3) writeLockFile/readLockFile deduplicated into shared src/core/lock-utils.ts

tasks.title: Implement caamp doctor command
notes: 2026-02-11 23:43:33 UTC: New CLI command: caamp doctor. From GAP-ANALYSIS.md Section 4.4 and 5.4. Diagnoses config issues: (1) Check broken symlinks in skill directories, (2) Validate registry integrity (all provider entries valid), (3) Verify config file existence and readability for detected providers, (4) Check lock file consistency, (5) Report version info (Node, npm, caamp), (6) Summary with pass/warn/fail status per check. Add to src/commands/doctor.ts, register in src/cli.ts.
[COMPLETED 2026-02-11T23:47:28Z] Doctor command implemented with all 6 check categories, colored output, and --json flag

tasks.title: Add --verbose and --quiet global flags
notes: 2026-02-11 23:43:40 UTC: From GAP-ANALYSIS.md Section 4.4. Add two global CLI flags: (1) --verbose/-v: Debug output showing config paths being read/written, detection methods tried, transform applied, etc. (2) --quiet/-q: Suppress all output except errors, for scripting use. Implement via shared logger utility that respects these flags. Update all commands to use logger instead of direct console.log.
[COMPLETED 2026-02-12T00:01:57Z] Added --verbose and --quiet global flags with logger utility. Build, typecheck, 120 tests pass.

tasks.title: Update GAP-ANALYSIS.md and file inventory for v0.3.0 state
notes: 2026-02-11 23:43:48 UTC: Update claudedocs/GAP-ANALYSIS.md to reflect v0.3.0 work: (1) Update Section 9 file inventory with actual file counts and line counts (currently shows v0.1.0 data), (2) Add v0.3.0 Results section paralleling v0.2.0 Results, (3) Update test count and coverage areas, (4) Reconcile Section 6 roadmap with what was actually completed, (5) Update Section 1 shipped inventory numbers

[COMPLETED 2026-02-11T23:55:10Z] Gap analysis updated for v0.3.0 state: Section 1 numbers updated (22 commands, 30 core files, 2953 core lines, 88 exports, 120 tests, Node>=20), Section 2 gaps updated with v0.3.0 fixes, Section 4 feature gaps marked as done, Section 5.2/5.4/5.5 deferred items resolved, Section 5.7 added with full v0.3.0 results, Section 6 retitled as remaining items, Section 9 file inventory rebuilt from actual counts

tasks.title: Fix API-REFERENCE.md based on T030 audit findings
notes: 2026-02-11 23:49:06 UTC: Apply critical and high findings from T030 audit: (1) Fix checkSkillUpdate return type - add status field, (2) Fix checkSkillUpdate description - remove 'not implemented' text, (3) Fix MarketplaceClient search/getSkill return types - either export MarketplaceResult or align types, (4) Add new logger exports (setVerbose, setQuiet, isVerbose, isQuiet) to docs, (5) Add ProviderPriority and ProviderStatus type docs. See claudedocs/agent-outputs/T030-api-audit.md for full details.

[COMPLETED 2026-02-11T23:52:17Z] API-REFERENCE.md updated with all 5 audit fixes: (1) checkSkillUpdate return type now includes status field and accurate behavior description, (2) MarketplaceClient methods now show MarketplaceResult return type with MarketplaceResult exported from index.ts, (3) Logger section added documenting setVerbose/setQuiet/isVerbose/isQuiet, (4) ProviderPriority and ProviderStatus union types documented and exported from index.ts, (5) Export count updated to 89 (28 types + 60 functions + 1 class)
